name: WP Tao One Time Offer
author: WP Tao Co.

sections.description:
The WP Tao OTO is plugin with gives you ability to set any page as One Time Offer. Thanks to that you can create high convertalbe “buy now or never” promotional offers (e.g. after customer buy something else or after subscribe to your newsletter) and increase your sells.

The plugin works even if user have cookies disabled, nay even on different computers if user is known! We can use so advanced technology because the plugin uses WP Tao fingerprinting (and requires WP Tao for work).

How it works?

Just install and activate the plugin, configure redirect URL (user will be redirected there when try to see given page again) for chosen page and voila! OTO works!

Feedback

Have an idea for a new feature? We’d love to hear your suggestions.
Feel free to contact us using the contact form available on the website:
http://wptao.org

Translations

  • English – default, always included
  • Polish
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory wp-tao-one-time-offer and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to chosen page and set redirect URL to enable OTO.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1, June 19, 2017

  • FIX: WP Tao 1.2.7 compatibility issue

1.0, July 8, 2016

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory wp-tao-one-time-offer and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to chosen page and set redirect URL to enable OTO.

short_description: Set any page as One Time Offer and show your special promotion only once per user! Works even when cookie is disabled or cleared!
